alert.note: Alert for Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:23PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rock and west central Holt Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newport, or 14 miles northeast of Bassett, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atkinson, Stuart and Newport. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 268 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
